text: Juan del Río Martín (14 October 1947 – 28 January 2021) was a Spanish Roman Catholic prelate. He was the Military Archbishop of Ordinary of Spain from 2008 until his death in 2021. From 2000 to 2008, he was Bishop of Asidonia- Jerez. del Río Martín was born in Ayamonte, Spain. del Río Martín died on 28 January 2021 from COVID-19 in Madrid, aged 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Madrid Category:Spanish Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Juan del Río Martín
